cap:info.cap:headline: YELLOW ADVISORY: Strong winds and Large waves
cap:info.cap:description: Strong winds and large waves are expected over coastal areas of Dar es salaam, Tanga, Pwani, Lindi and Mtwara regions together with Unguja and Pemba isles. Likelihood of occurrence is MODERATE and expected Impacts are MODERATE. The expected impacts of this phenomenon are widespread of rubbish, falling of leaves and small tree branches, challenge to some of marine activities, scarcity of fish and associated impacts.
cap:info.cap:instruction:
Sea users and Residents of high risk areas are advised TO TAKE ACTIONS
TMA will continue to monitor the situation and issue updates when necessary.
